xml:
Movicol<tm tmtype="reg"/> liquid Indications and dose

Chronic constipation

By mouth

  • Child 12–17 years

    25 mL 1–3 times a day usually for up to 2 weeks; maintenance 25 mL 1–2 times a day.

  • Adult

    25 mL 1–3 times a day usually for up to 2 weeks; maintenance 25 mL 1–2 times a day.

 Directions for administration

25 mL of oral concentrate to be diluted with half a glass (approx. 100 mL) of water. After dilution the solution should be discarded if unused after 24 hours.
Prescribing and dispensing information

25 mL of oral concentrate when diluted with 100 mL water provides K+ 5.4 mmol/litre.
Patient and carer advice

Patients or carers should be counselled on how to take Movicol oral solution.
Clinical medicinal product information Clinical medicinal product information
